metadata.title: CVE-2022-0546 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: A missing bounds check in the image loader used in Blender 3.x and 2.93.8 leads to out-of-bounds heap access, allowing an attacker to cause denial of service, memory corruption or potentially code execution.

criterions.comment: blender package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
